page.title: 06Houses in Much Marcle
page.content: In Much Marcle there are many different houses.There are lots of cottages and farmhouses which are built of stone or are half timbered. There aren't many modern bungalows but there are four or five council houses. There are no flats or housing estates. In the village there are old houses which people buy and renovate.Opposite the school there is a very old house which has been rebuilt.Part of it was Tudor wattle and daub.They have made it into a very nice house to live in.The houses in Much Marcle are expensive to buy.For example a three bedroomed bungalow near school cost eighty-two thousand pounds.It seems a lot of money but it is worth it to come and live in Much Marcle.
